ModMetadata.Name: Stationpedia Calculator [StationeersMods]
ModMetadata.Author: vinus
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Stationpedia Calculator[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods
Demonstration Link: https://youtu.be/Bjh0wN31I_M A fully capable calculator built straight into the stationpedia. Can do many functions and equations! (cos, sin, tan, acos, asin, atan, floor, ceiling, abs, pow, exp, sqrt)
you can also go here to get the dll itself if you want to just put it in your bepinex/plugins folder: https://github.com/TerameTechYT/StationeersSharp/tree/development/Build/x64/Release
ModMetadata.InGameDescription: Stationpedia Calculator WARNING: This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods.
